short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add buttons to Prnt.sc to navigate between images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds buttons for navigating between images on the site "https://prnt.sc/". It adds the random button for going to a random image, the next button to go to the next image in alphabetical order and the previous button to navigate to the previous button in alphabetic order.
